snippet.title: AlphaBetty Saga - Out now on Mobile - King Games
snippet.description:
Play with words in AlphaBetty Saga! A fun-tastic new word game that will take you on a rip-roaring adventure to the far-flung corners of the mouse world. Join Professor Alpha, Betty and their loyal friend Barney as they embark on an epic quest to collect new words and complete the Encyclopedia of Everything! 

Official website: www.alphabettysaga.com 

---------------------------------------------------------
Hi there! We're King. Officially, we are a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world. Unofficially, we’re a big bunch of passionate gamers. Our hits include Candy Crush Saga, Pet Rescue Saga, Bubble Witch 2 Saga and Farm Heroes Saga. We design games for everyone, no matter where they are, who they are or how much time they have. Our games are simple to learn but challenging to master. Maximum enjoyment. Minimum fuss. Or as we like to call it, bitesize brilliance. 

- More about us: http://to.king.com/Rhho
